'''Jonas Mårtensson''' was the strategy director of [[Mojang Studios]].{{Verify}} He joined the company as vice president on October 2, 2013, when his twin brother and then-CEO of Mojang, [[Carl Manneh]], announced his recruitment.<ref name="CarlClone">{{Citation|url=https://mojang.com/2013/10/mojang-invents-cloning-technology/|title=Mojang invents cloning technology|author=[[Carl Manneh]]|website=Mojang|date=October 2, 2013|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140122053114/https://mojang.com/2013/10/mojang-invents-cloning-technology/}}</ref> With the acquisition of Mojang by Microsoft in November of 2014 and the subsequent retirement of his brother, he assumed the position of CEO.<ref>https://help.mojang.com/customer/portal/articles/331367-employees</ref>
{{q|A few months back I had a casual conversation in the office kitchen talking about the insane amount of things going on at Mojang. I said something in the lines of 'I wish I could clone myself'. I remember Tobias mumbling something like 'I’ll look into that'. Yesterday Tobias came back to me and said he had something to show me. Introducing Mojang’s new Vice President: Jonas Mårtensson! Sometimes it’s just nice to be able to clone yourself… or hire your twin brother.|[[Carl Manneh]]<ref name="CarlClone" />|image=Carl - Mojang avatar.png}} He left Mojang in September 2024.<ref>https://www.linkedin.com/in/jonas-m%C3%A5rtensson-28815712</ref>
